message_0: Calling all. This is our last cry before our eternal silence. French Navy ceased using Morse code on January 31, 1997, the final transmitted message
message_3: What hath God wrought the official first Morse code message transmitted in the U.S. on May 24, 1844
message_4: · · · 　– – – 　· · · Save Our Ship, the International rescue signals
message_5: – · – · 　– – · – 　– · · Come Quick Danger, Rescue signals used until the early 20th century
message_6: Samuel Morse the American painter Origin of the name
message_7: CW (Continuous Wave) Another name called Morse code
message_9: About 30 years Number of years Morse code played before the invention of the telephone
message_10: Alfred Vail and Joseph Henry Realizes the idea of Samuel Morse (but, Morse ninja the patent)
message_11: Alfred Vail complete the Morse code system
message_12: Joseph Henry Developer of the Morse key
message_14: Son, you've got a plan! Parasite (film)
